description: Behind the Ainsworth Hotsprings is road which leads to a 4X4 track that with high clearance vehicle can be driven to the view point at the Ainsworth Historic Cemetery. You can also hike or ride up the road to see the view
directions: You can park at hot springs and walk to road behind or find Sutton Street go north one block to North street follow north street. You could park where the 4X4 track begins and hike from there.
title: Ainsworth Historic Cemetery View point
